thread.section_title: Hotel Keppler - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: An amazing little find in a great location
thread.title_full: An amazing little find in a great location - Review of Hotel Keppler, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Grant H
title: An amazing little find in a great location
text:
We recently visited Paris and stumbled across this boutique hotel. The location looked ideal, nearby the Arc de Triomphe and walking distance to the Champs-Elys√©es.
The entire experience, from beginning to end, was amazing. The service is exemplary, and I found the team particularly helpful in organizing dinner reservations, or confirming outings within Paris.
This restaurant does not have a restaurant for dinner, but a lovely breakfast is served every day. There is a wide variety of dining establishments close by. The bar service in the afternoons at the hotel is really special - being able to sip on champagne before heading out is a lovely treat.
